title: Junior IOS developer
description:
The role:
We are looking for a junior IOS programmer that aligns with ELSA’s mission to help every language learner speak English fluently and confidently. As part of ELSA’s team, you will build high-quality features for English learners in over 100 countries around the world. Your role will influence the future of the ELSA product vision and help the iOS team stay on cutting edge technologies. 
Join our world-class team and be one of the personalities that make the ELSA culture awesome.

As part of your role you will:
- Design and implement new features for iOS, in Swift
- Maintain and extend the test coverage of the app
- Support the team with bug fixing and code maintenance
- Contribute to a solid development process that includes tests, pull requests and peer code reviews
- Communicate remotely on a daily basis with your colleagues around the world
- Continue to learn and tackle new technical challenges
requirements:
Requirements
- Minimum 2 years of experience in iOS development in Swift (professionally or not).
- Have contributed to release at least one iOS app in the App Store.
- Practice professional software development (Automated testing, code reviews, CI/CD)
- Master level degree in Computer Science or related subject.
- Experience with Git.
- Eager to learn and apply the software design patterns in your code
- Communicate well in English with the team in Lisbon
